name: Global Link Graph Builder
description: Builds a global article link graph from resolved internal links, computing inbound/outbound counts, detecting orphans/dead-ends, and emitting JSON for UI and analytics.

parameters.include_redirects: boolean flag to include redirect edges in the graph
parameters.min_edge_weight: integer minimum weight threshold for emitting edges (default: 1)
parameters.strict: boolean flag to treat warnings as errors

responsibilities: Ingest resolved link data (or re-extract if necessary)
Compute inbound/outbound degrees and basic centrality stats
Detect orphans, dead-ends, and isolated subgraphs
Emit deterministic graph artifacts and diagnostics
